dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Oh hello there! Did you happen to see my cat around here somewhere?

dialog.name: cat
dialog.message: Sadly, my cat has been missing since this giant hole formed... It may have something to do with it...
I see that you are an adventurer... If you are going into the hole, I suggest you speak to Achetran the mage on the other side of the hole. He may have some information for you.
